reviewText: Great content in this lick library DVD but it contains no tab which means that it will take longer to learn these awesome neo classical licks. However, if you're patient and study the DVD you will learn some valuable licks and skills from it. At least the teacher plays the licks slowly and tells you which fret and note which is good. But, If only lick library added tab to their dvds they would sell faster than they could make them.  Jesus is your answer for life and peace. Romans 10:9-10 :)
This will keep you busy for quite a long time.
There are no tabs or notation with this video.  How can you learn these fast riffs just by watching the guy play them?
